title: Survival Horror Audio Solution
description: Survival Horror Audio Solution contains 102 high quality files including music, ambient loops and sound effects. Electronic-based tracks included are perfect for exploring a post apocalyptic land, living a terrifying story or getting into a haunted house.
longDescription:
Preview FULL MIX: soundcloud.com/plasticsounddesign/survival-horror-audio-solution-full-mix

MUSIC: soundcloud.com/plasticsounddesign/sets/survival-horror-audio-solution-music-preview

AMBIENT: soundcloud.com/plasticsounddesign/sets/survival-horror-audio-solution-ambient-preview


Survival Horror Audio Solution contains 102 high quality files including music, ambient loops and sound effects. Electronic-based tracks included are perfect for exploring a post apocalyptic land, living a terrifying story, getting into a haunted house or facing zombies or mutants.


The main Music loop tracks included are:

• Finding The Way 1:36

• Run or Die 1:29

• Solitude And Hope 1:57

• Hordes of Enemies 2:12

• Blood Party 1:12

• This Can't Be The End 2:05

• Mysterious 1:24


Ambient loop tracks: Dark Path, Death Valley, Desolate City, Crossroads, Haunted House and Howling.


82 SFX files: creatures, weapons, steps, doors, explosions,... (Check the Full List)

All tracks are perfectly seamless wave files at 44 KHz, 16 Bit and Stereo.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 102
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes
How many minutes of audio provided: 36:34
Intended Platform: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus
